name: Project L.L.A.M.A.
description:
This game (formerly known as AiRena) is a fast paced local multiplayer party game. 2-4 players can battle each other. The ultimate goal of this instant kill game is to be the first to reach 10 kills through head jumps or items. Gather your friends in front of a screen just like in the good old console times.

Project L.L.A.M.A. (Legendary Local Action Multiplayer Arena) is the successor of the AirConsole game AiRena (https://airena.itch.io/airena)

IMPORTANT

ONLY tested with XBox 360 controllers! 

We know there might be some minor bugs. This was more a proof of concept but turned out to be too funny to not share it. 

There will not be any future updates.
